title: Chat Application
description: A modern, real-time chat web application built with Node.js, Socket.IO, and a clean, responsive UI. Users can join different topic-based rooms and communicate with others in real-time.

title: Serve-Ease (Capstone)
description: ServeEase is a modern, user-friendly home maintenance service app designed for seamless connections between users and trusted service providers.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app that provides real-time weather information based on city search or user location. It is built using html, css and javascript with open Weather api.
